relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.
